title: Lentil salad with herbs and Toulouse sausage

For the salad: 50g/1¾oz fresh green beans, blanched and chopped
salt and freshly ground black pepper
For the sausages: 100g/3½oz sausage meat shaped into a patty
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: For the lentil salad, mix all the salad ingredients together in a mixing bowl and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
For the Toulouse sausage, rub the patty with the olive oil and pan-fry for two minutes on each side, unitl lightly browned.
Serve the lentil salad on a serving plate with the patty on top.
